title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 345.9 - Effective date of option selection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 345.9 - Effective date of option selection

State Regulations

Election of an option provided in this Part shall not become
effective if the member dies before the effective date of his retirement, or
within 30 days after the filing in the office of the Comptroller of the
application for his retirement unless expressly authorized by section
90
or section
390
of the Retirement and Social Security

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
345.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
